#summary ReleaseNotes 0.5.1

Bug Fixes:

 * Zone name has been added to web.xml and is used to generate home dir for users.
 * Only accessible resources are retrieved when changing the default resource.

Upgrade from 0.5.0:

 * replace $JETTY_HOME/webapps/root/WEB-INF/lib/davis.jar
 * replace $JETTY_HOME/webapps/root/WEB-INF/web.xml and modify it accordingly
